full_text: 7. IT IS FURTHER STIPULATED AND AGREED THAT this stipulation, marked as Government Exhibit 1004, and Government Exhibits 11, 12, 13, 14, 15, and 16, may be received in evidence at trial. Dated: November 8, 2021 New York, New York DAMIAN WILLIAMS United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York By: Maurene Comey / Alison Moe Lara Pomerantz / Andrew Rohrbach Assistant United States Attorneys Southern District of New York Christian Everdell, Esq. / Laura Menninger, Esq. Jeffrey Pagliuca, Esq. / Bobbi Sternheim, Esq. Attorneys for Defendant Ghislaine Maxwell

text_blocks.content: 7. IT IS FURTHER STIPULATED AND AGREED THAT this stipulation, marked as Government Exhibit 1004, and Government Exhibits 11, 12, 13, 14, 15, and 16, may be received in evidence at trial.
Dated: November 8, 2021 New York, New York
DAMIAN WILLIAMS United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York
By: Maurene Comey / Alison Moe Lara Pomerantz / Andrew Rohrbach Assistant United States Attorneys Southern District of New York
Christian Everdell, Esq. / Laura Menninger, Esq. Jeffrey Pagliuca, Esq. / Bobbi Sternheim, Esq. Attorneys for Defendant Ghislaine Maxwell

organizations: United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York

additional_notes: The document is a legal stipulation signed by attorneys for both the prosecution and defense in a court case involving Ghislaine Maxwell. The document is dated November 8, 2021, and is from the Southern District of New York.
